eu.jangos.auth.utils

Class AuthUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.jangos.auth.utils.AuthUtils

  • public class AuthUtils
extends Object
    AuthUtils is an helper class for the authentication server, allowing to generate server packets.
    Version:
    v0.1 BETA.
    Author:
    Warkdev

    • Method Detail

      • isValidIP4Address

        public static boolean isValidIP4Address(String ipAddress)
        Check whether the ip passed in parameter is a valid IPv4 address or not.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - The IP to be validated
        Returns:
        a boolean value, true if the address is a valid IPv4, false otherwise.

      • generateSAuthLogonChallengePacket

        public static SAuthLogonChallengePacket generateSAuthLogonChallengePacket(SRPServer server)
        Generates a SAuthLogonChallengePacket based on the SRPServer calculation.
        Parameters:
        server - The SRPServer used to make the calculation of the challenge.
        Returns:
        The created packet.
        See Also:
        SAuthLogonChallengePacket, SRPServer

      • generateSAuthLogonProofPacket

        public static SAuthLogonProofPacket generateSAuthLogonProofPacket(byte[] b)
        Generates an SAuthLogonProofPacket from a byte proof.
        Parameters:
        b - The proof, in an array of bytes, calculated by the server.
        Returns:
        The generated packet.
        See Also:
        SAuthLogonProofPacket
